St._George.Dixie Applied Technology College: Dixie Technical College (Dixie Tech) is a public technical training institution located in St. George, Utah, and is part of the statewide Utah College of Applied Technology system. Dixie Tech was established on September 1, 2001 by the Utah State Legislature and currently offers certificate programs in Auto Body, Diesel Technology, Drafting, Manufacturing Operations, Medical Assisting, Office Technology and a Pharmacy Technician program.
